sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import { AppContext } from './Context' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const SingleProduct = () => { const { id } = useParams() console.log(id) const data = useContext(AppContext) console.log(data[`${id-1}`].title) return (

{data[`${id-1}`].title}

{data[`${id-1}`].description}

${data[`${id-1}`].price.toFixed(2)}

) } export default SingleProduct
